Trim all sequences

Source: R/handlers.R
trim_asvs.Rd

trim_asvs() trims sequence ends of the sequence supplied in the taxa table. This function assumes that the sequence variable in the taxon table is called "sequence".

Usage

trim_asvs(ta, start, end)

Arguments

ta

A tidytacos object.

start

Index of where to start trimming.

end

Index of where to stop trimming.

Value

A tidytacos object.

Examples

# keep only the first 200 nucleotides of the sequences
urt %>% trim_asvs(0, 200)
